ids_info.name: spectrometer_uv
ids_info.description: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic

spectrometer_uv/etendue.documentation: Etendue (geometric extent) of the optical system. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic.

spectrometer_uv/etendue_method.documentation: Method used to calculate the etendue. Index = 0 : exact calculation with a 4D integral; 1 : approximation with first order formula (detector surface times solid angle subtended by the apertures); 2 : other methods. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic.

spectrometer_uv/etendue_method/name.documentation: Short string identifier. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within etendue_method container: Method used to calculate the etendue. Index = 0 : exact calculation with a 4D integral; 1 : approximation with first order formula (detector surface times solid angle subtended by the apertures); 2 : other methods.

spectrometer_uv/etendue_method/index.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within etendue_method container: Method used to calculate the etendue. Index = 0 : exact calculation with a 4D integral; 1 : approximation with first order formula (detector surface times solid angle subtended by the apertures); 2 : other methods.

spectrometer_uv/etendue_method/descripti.documentation: Verbose description. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within etendue_method container: Method used to calculate the etendue. Index = 0 : exact calculation with a 4D integral; 1 : approximation with first order formula (detector surface times solid angle subtended by the apertures); 2 : other methods.

spectrometer_uv/channel.documentation: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic.

spectrometer_uv/channel/name.documentation: Name of the channel. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

spectrometer_uv/channel/detector_layout.documentation: Dimensions of pixels and detector. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

spectrometer_uv/channel/detector_layout/.documentation: Pixel dimension in each direction (horizontal, vertical). Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector_layout container: Dimensions of pixels and detector.

Number of pixels in each direction (horizontal, vertical). Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector_layout container: Dimensions of pixels and detector.

Total detector dimension in each direction (horizontal, vertical). Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector_layout container: Dimensions of pixels and detector.

spectrometer_uv/channel/detector.documentation: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

spectrometer_uv/channel/detector/geometr.documentation: Type of geometry used to describe the surface of the detector or aperture (1:'outline', 2:'circular', 3:'rectangle'). In case of 'outline', the surface is described by an outline of point in a local coordinate system defined by a centre and three unit vectors X1, X2, X3. Note that there is some flexibility here and the data provider should choose the most convenient coordinate system for the object, respecting the definitions of (X1,X2,X3) indicated below. In case of 'circular', the surface is a circle defined by its centre, radius, and normal vector oriented towards the plasma X3.  In case of 'rectangle', the surface is a rectangle defined by its centre, widths in the X1 and X2 directions, and normal vector oriented towards the plasma X3. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate.

spectrometer_uv/channel/detector/centre.documentation: If geometry_type=2, coordinates of the centre of the circle. If geometry_type=1 or 3, coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the plane detector/aperture. This origin is located within the detector/aperture area. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate.

spectrometer_uv/channel/detector/centre/.documentation: Major radius. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate. Within centre container: If geometry_type=2, coordinates of the centre of the circle. If geometry_type=1 or 3, coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the plane detector/aperture. This origin is located within the detector/aperture area.

Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate. Within centre container: If geometry_type=2, coordinates of the centre of the circle. If geometry_type=1 or 3, coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the plane detector/aperture. This origin is located within the detector/aperture area.

Height. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate. Within centre container: If geometry_type=2, coordinates of the centre of the circle. If geometry_type=1 or 3, coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the plane detector/aperture. This origin is located within the detector/aperture area.

spectrometer_uv/channel/detector/radius.documentation: Radius of the circle, used only if geometry_type = 2. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate.

spectrometer_uv/channel/detector/x1_unit.documentation: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate.

Component along X axis. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

Component along Y axis. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

Component along Z axis. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

spectrometer_uv/channel/detector/x2_unit.documentation: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate.

Component along X axis. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate. Within x2_unit_vector container: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

Component along Y axis. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate. Within x2_unit_vector container: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

Component along Z axis. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate. Within x2_unit_vector container: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

spectrometer_uv/channel/detector/x3_unit.documentation: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the detector/aperture plane and oriented towards the plasma. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate.

Component along X axis. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate. Within x3_unit_vector container: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the detector/aperture plane and oriented towards the plasma.

Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate. The X3 axis is normal to the detector/aperture plane and oriented towards the plasma.

spectrometer_uv/channel/detector/x1_widt.documentation: Full width of the aperture in the X1 direction, used only if geometry_type = 3. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate.

spectrometer_uv/channel/detector/x2_widt.documentation: Full width of the aperture in the X2 direction, used only if geometry_type = 3. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate.

spectrometer_uv/channel/detector/outline.documentation: Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate.

Positions along x1 axis. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

Positions along x2 axis. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

spectrometer_uv/channel/detector/surface.documentation: Surface of the detector/aperture, derived from the above geometric data. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector container: Description of the front face of the micro channel plate.

spectrometer_uv/channel/detector_positio.documentation: In case of detector moving during a pulse, position parameter allowing to record and compute the detector position as a function of time. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

Data. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector_position_parameter container: In case of detector moving during a pulse, position parameter allowing to record and compute the detector position as a function of time.

Time. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within detector_position_parameter container: In case of detector moving during a pulse, position parameter allowing to record and compute the detector position as a function of time.

spectrometer_uv/channel/line_of_sight.documentation: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. The 2nd point is allowed to evolve in case of dynamic line of sight. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

spectrometer_uv/channel/line_of_sight/fi.documentation: Position of the first point. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. The 2nd point is allowed to evolve in case of dynamic line of sight.

Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. The 2nd point is allowed to evolve in case of dynamic line of sight. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight of the channel, given by 2 points. spectrometer_uv/channel/grating/x1_unit_.documentation: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. spectrometer_uv/channel/grating/x2_unit_.documentation: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. Within processed_line container: Set of processed spectral lines. Within intensity container: Non-calibrated intensity (integrated over the spectrum for this line).

Time. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within processed_line container: Set of processed spectral lines. Within intensity container: Non-calibrated intensity (integrated over the spectrum for this line).

spectrometer_uv/channel/radiance_calibra.documentation: Radiance calibration. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).
Date of the radiance calibration (yyyy_mm_dd). Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

spectrometer_uv/channel/wavelength_calib.documentation: Wavelength calibration data. The wavelength is obtained from the pixel index k by: wavelength =  k * gain + offset. k is starting from 1. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

Offset. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within wavelength_calibration container: Wavelength calibration data. The wavelength is obtained from the pixel index k by: wavelength =  k * gain + offset. k is starting from 1.

Gain. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within wavelength_calibration container: Wavelength calibration data. The wavelength is obtained from the pixel index k by: wavelength =  k * gain + offset. k is starting from 1.
Date of the wavelength calibration (yyyy_mm_dd). Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

spectrometer_uv/channel/validity_timed.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for each wavelength and each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

spectrometer_uv/channel/validity_timed/d.documentation: Data. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within validity_timed container: Indicator of the validity of the data for each wavelength and each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity).

spectrometer_uv/channel/validity_timed/t.documentation: Time. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within validity_timed container: Indicator of the validity of the data for each wavelength and each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity).

spectrometer_uv/channel/validity.documentation: Indicator of the validity of the data for the whole acquisition period. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera).

spectrometer_uv/latency.documentation: Upper bound of the delay between physical information received by the detector and data available on the real-time (RT) network. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic.

spectrometer_uv/time.documentation: Generic time. Within spectrometer_uv IDS: Spectrometer in uv light range diagnostic.
